title: Frontend Developer
name: Roman Myrhorodskyi
summary: Frontend Developer with 4+ years of commercial experience building responsive and user-friendly web applications using React, Vue, and TypeScript. Proven ability to deliver scalable UI components, integrate with REST APIs, and collaborate in Agile teams.

list.description: Studying documentation, following industry trends, and refreshing frontend skills.

list.description: Built modular UI components for oschadbank.ua. Integrated cost calculator for toyota.ua. Integrated store map and customer cabinet for novus.ua.

list.description: Developed UI components and a dynamic cost calculator for wilive.fr. Built client-side tests related to health and fitness assessment.
